page.title: 15GORSEMOOR SCHOOL
page.content: Gorsemoor school is in Gorsemoor Road, Heath Hayes. It is an infant and junior school. It is a modern school which was opened in 1983. It is a different shape to any other school, the hall slants down. In the hall there is a lot of apparatuslike ropes, rope ladders climbing frames, bars and boxes. The classrooms are open plan because they have got no doors except the doors that lead into school. In school we have 10 bases and 3 classrooms. In each base we have a wet area with sinks and tiles on the floor where we do art. We have a quiet room for doing our work silently. We have a television and a video so that we can watch programmes to do with our work.
